Package gw.cc.financials.entity

package gw.cc.financials.entity
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    ClaimRpt
    ClaimRpt Calculated financial values for claims.
    FinancialCriterionMC
    FinancialCriterionMC Special subclass of FinancialsCriterionChoice to be used for multicurrency enabled searches
    FinancialsRptUpgrade
    FinancialsRptUpgrade Temp table used for updating rpt tables during 2.1.X->3.0 upgrade.
    PaymentSearchCriteria
    Criteria object used to search for Check entities in the local database.
    PaymentView
    PaymentView View entity for efficiently displaying Payment Transactions in list views.
    RecoveryReserveView
    RecoveryReserveView View entity for efficiently displaying Transactions in the RecoveryReserves mode list view.
    RecoverySearchCriteria
    Criteria object used to search for Recovery entities in the local database.
    RecoveryView
    RecoveryView View entity for efficiently displaying Transactions in the Recovery mode list view.
    ReserveLine
    ReserveLine A unique combination of Claim, Exposure, CostType and CostCategory against which reserves can be set and payments made.
    ReserveView
    ReserveView View entity for efficiently displaying Transactions in the Reserve mode list view.
    RICoding
    RICoding A unique combination of ReserveLine (Claim, Exposure, CostType and CostCategory) and RIAgreement, against which Reinsurance transactions are made.
    RITransaction
    RITransaction Represents a reinsurance financial operation, adding to the reinsurance financials calculations as a consequence of the creation of Reserves or Payments.
    RITransactionSet
    A set of RI transactions.
    TmpExposureRptStaging
    TmpExposureRptStaging Temp table used for populating the ExposureRpt table from the staging tables
    TmpStagingExposureRpt
    TmpStagingExposureRpt Temp table utilized during the population of the production ExposureRpt table from staging tables.
    Transaction
    Transaction (either reserve, payment, recovery, or recovery reserve) for a particular claim or exposure.
    TransactionDefaultView
    TransactionDefaultView View entity for efficiently displaying Transactions in the Default mode list view.
    TransactionEditWrapper
    TransactionEditWrapper
    TransactionLineItem
    TransactionLineItem A line item within a transaction (either reserve, recovery, or payment) for further categorization.
    TransactionOffset
    TransactionOffset A TransactionOffset relates a transaction to its offsetting transactions (if any).
    TransactionOnset
    TransactionOnset A TransactionOnset relates a transaction to its onsetting transactions (if any).
    TransactionRelatedExchangeRateInUse
     
    TransactionSearchView
    TransactionSearchView Abstract base view entity for efficiently displaying Transactions in list views.
    TransactionSet
    TransactionSet A group of items submitted at once for approval.
    TransactionSetDocument
    TransactionSetDocument Table linking documents to transactionsets.
    TransactionView
    TransactionView Abstract base view entity for efficiently displaying Transactions in list views.
